name: Category
description: this is for the categories crud functionality

requests.name: api/admin/categories/update/:id
requests.description:
this is to update categories...
required are the following
'id'=>required
'category'=>'required|string',
    'image.*' => 'image|mimes:jpeg,bmp,png|max:8000'
    
the header must also carry Authorization: Bearer <token>

requests.name: api/admin/categories/create
requests.description:
this parameters are required on the body and it creates a new category:

'category' => 'required|string',
  'image.*' => 'image|mimes:jpeg,bmp,png|max:8000',

the header must also carry Authorization: Bearer <token>

requests.name: api/admin/categories/delete/:id
requests.description:
this is to delete a category as well as its image...
required are the following
'id'=>required

the header must also carry Authorization: Bearer <token>

requests.name: api/admin/categories/all-content/:pagination?
requests.description:
this is to get all the categories pagination is optional and can be done by passing another parameter after all-content in the url
the header must also carry Authorization: Bearer <token>
